sounds: You can't run or hide forever!
I'm the executioner of the Seven!
The judgement is guilty! The sentence is death!
name: Ushuriel
location: In the [[Demon Forge]] following the [[Hall of the Colossi]]. He is the first Demon Forge boss of [[The Inquisition Quest]].
strategy:
[[File:In.jpg|thumb|Using invisible before entering Ushuriel Seal (Antica)]]It's very powerful, so bring a high level blocker (150+) and a couple of paladins and/or mages to shoot it. Druids are highly advised to heal the blocker. All players should wear [[Stealth Ring]]s or use [[Utana Vid]] considering this boss is guarded by multiple [[Eye Of The Seven|Eyes Of The Seven]] which can deal up to 500 damage per turn, these are not immune to invisibility.
Players who attempt to kill Ushuriel solo, should create energy fields with [[Energy Wall Rune]] on the ground and make him walk over them. Knights are advised to bring the strongest elemental melee weapon, for example [[Tagralt Blade]], to hit him with [[Blood Rage]] and some exori attacks while running. Soloing Ushuriel will take some time though.
